data.message: Best Facebook Moment of 2010 from Marianne Meehan: "I want to express my sincere gratitude for FB! I was diagnosed with Stage 2 Breast Cancer in April 2010. This was a very terrifying experience for me. But here I stand, in total remission. I have reconnected with some old friends and The Pink Sisterhood. They have inspired me, loved me & kept my spirits high…” Read more and share your story at http://ow.ly/3qpJi.
